name: Boxing Heros: World Fight
description:
Best boxing simualtor to play and learn the boxing game. Fight with the opponent with all the available boxing shots. Defend and punch back to hit score or to achieve knock outs.
The jab is the perfect weapon to set up any of the three above body shots.
It is quick and can be used as a feint to distract or a measuring stick to gauge distance.
Though the jabs in whatever way you want, hit hard and get point to win.
Step Jab, Side Step Jab, Body Jab, Up Jab, Range Finder, Feint Jab is all there to help you out.
Body Shots Available
-> Rear Hook Body Shot
-> Straight Body Shot
-> Rear Uppercut Body Shot
-> Cross Lead Body Hook
-> Rear Hook Body Shot

This game supports ads
